events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The case has been identified as a refund request due to incorrect product delivery.
An agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the customer.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I’m here to assist you with your refund.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received to proceed with the refund?
Sure, my order number is 4587321, and I have attached the picture showing the incorrect item I got.
Thank you for the details. We will process your refund within 3-5 business days and send you confirmation once completed.
Great, I appreciate the quick response and will wait for the refund confirmation. Thanks for your help!
The refund has been successfully processed and should appear in your account shortly. Please contact us if you have any further issues.
Just checking in to confirm you received your refund and are satisfied with the resolution of your case.
Since the refund issue has been resolved and confirmed, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support!
Please take a moment to answer our brief customer satisfaction survey regarding your recent support experience.
I’ve completed the survey and am happy with how quickly and efficiently the refund was handled. Thanks again!
This case has been archived according to our retention policies, marking the end of this support interaction.
